user_question: How many hand drawn cartoons are included in the slides to illustrate the idea?

knowledge_chain.summary: The slides do not include any hand-drawn cartoons. The visual materials consist of minimalist infographics, bar charts, flowcharts, whiteboard diagrams, dashboard interfaces, and photographs of office scenes. While some whiteboard images show handwritten notes, these are informal annotations and not stylized cartoon illustrations intended for illustrative purposes.
